text: "When Love Breaks Down" is a 1984 song by English band Prefab Sprout and is the leading single from their second studio album Steve McQueen. It went to number 25 in the United Kingdom, number 55 in Australia, number 38 in New Zealand and number 42 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart. It has been covered by The Zombies, Lisa Stansfield and Snow Patrol. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Sophisti-pop songs Category:Prefab Sprout songs Category:Lisa Stansfield songs Category:Snow Patrol songs Category:The Zombies songs
